class.description: Variable representing a 2D angular acceleration at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 3D angular acceleration (aroll, apitch, ayaw) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 2D linear acceleration (ax, ay) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 3D linear acceleration (ax, ay, az) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 2D orientation (theta) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 3D orientation as a quaternion at a specific time and for a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 2D point landmark that exists across time.
Variable representing a 2D point landmark that exists across time. This version is assumed to be known perfectly, and will not be updated during optimization.
Variable representing a 3D point landmark that exists across time.
Variable representing a 3D point landmark that exists across time. This version is assumed to be known perfectly, and will not be updated during optimization.
Variable representing a 2D position (x, y) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 3D position (x, y, z) at a specific time and for a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 2D angular velocity (vtheta) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 3D angular velocity (vroll, vpitch, vyaw) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 2D linear velocity (vx, vy) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
Variable representing a 3D linear velocity (vx, vy, vz) at a specific time, with a specific piece of hardware.
